inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: underwent a complete CV assessment including medical history, physical examination, blood pressure measurement and 12-lead electrocardiogram.

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: A complete dental examination will be performed on each patient in both groups.

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: no other cardiovascular risk factors such as smoking, high blood pressure, and diabetes mellitus

notes: The patient has a family history of CAD but no other cardiovascular risk factors. He has severe stenosis in the left internal carotid artery.
